text: Under the Yum Yum Tree is a 1963 American romantic comedy movie directed by David Swift and based on the play of the same name by Lawrence Roman. It stars Jack Lemmon, Carol Lynley, Dean Jones, Edie Adams, Paul Lynde, Joy Harmon, Bill Bixby and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1963 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies set in California Category:Movies about landlords Category:Movies set in apartment buildings
title: Under the Yum Yum Tree
